spec_data.Name: texlive-kotex-oblivoir
spec_data.Description:
The class is based on memoir, and is adapted to typesetting
Korean documents. The bundle (of class and associated packages)
belongs to the ko.TeX bundle.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:52:52 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A LaTeX document class for typesetting Korean documents
